name: 張充鑫
objective:
本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、焊接，工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、熱處理、粉末加工及測量、非傳統加工及機械裝配等。
This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:
1. engineering of materials
2. forming of materials 
3. traditional casting processes
4. broaching and sawing
5. turning and boring
6. drilling and reaming
7. milling and grinding
8. machine tools 
9. nontraditional machining
10. Machinary assembly
schedule:
1. 製造簡介與概述(Introduction)
2.材料性質與產品 (Material properties and products) 
3.金屬鑄造基本原理(Principles of casting)
4.玻璃加工，塑膠及複合材料成型 ( GFRP, CFRP machining)
5. 粉末冶金 (Powder metallurgy)
6.金屬成形與板金加工 (Metal forming and metal sheet cutting)
7.金屬切削理論 (Principles of metal cutting)
8.切削加工與工具機 (Metal cutting and Machine tool)
9.切削刀具技術 (Cutting tool skill)
10.磨削與其他研磨製程 (Grinding and analysis of grinding process)
11.非傳統切削及熱切削製程 (Nontraditional cutting)
12.金屬熱處理與表面處理製程 (Metal heat treatment and surface processing)
13.焊接基礎與焊接製程(Welding and processing)
14.機械裝配 (Machine assembly)
15.快速原型及添加製造(Rapid prototyping and additive manufacturing)
scorePolicy:
期中考 (Midterm test，close book) :30%
期末考 (Final exam, close book ) : 30%
平常成績 (Usual grades) : 參與問題討論、上課出缺勤狀況、作業及報告等 : 40%
